sense.def: Pathological Condition of tan yin 痰飲 , phlegm rheum, brought forth by xu lao 虛勞 , depletion exhaustion, or phlegm rheum accompanied by depletion exhaustion. Ru yi jing yao 儒醫精要 Recipe Entry er chen tang 二陳湯 , decoction with two matured ingredients: 夫二陳湯內 有半夏，性煨烈，若風痰、寒痰與食痰則相宜；若勞痰、吐血、鼻血、 瀉血、尿血、血崩，皆不可用 , “Now, the ingredients of er chen tang include ban xia . Its nature is heating and fierce. In the case of wind phlegm, cold phlegm, and food phlegm [this medication] is appropriate. In the case of exhaustion phlegm , blood spitting, nosebleed, blood in the stools, blood in the urine, and blood collapse, it must never be used”.
